name: Ball Blasters
description:
This is a simple game which was inspired by a classic game of Capture The Flag and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-rwo_qdLag8. This game is by no means complete but I just wanted to submit something for the Jam as it my first time. The entire source code is avaliable on Github: https://github.com/Rud156/Sketches.

Feedback is appreciated
